sentences.en: A dozen inmates have absconded from Forest Jail in the past year.
sentences.cn: 去年共有12名犯人从福雷斯特监狱逃脱。

sentences.en: Before sentence was passed, Mr Mills escaped from jail.
sentences.cn: 在宣判前，米尔斯先生越狱了。

sentences.en: Even in jail, my fellow inmates treated me with kindness.
sentences.cn: 就算在监狱里，狱友们对我也很友善。

sentences.en: He picked a fight with a waiter and landed in jail.
sentences.cn: 他找碴儿跟服务生打了一架，最后进了监狱。

sentences.en: He was to remain in jail in the interim.
sentences.cn: 他在此期间将会继续被关押。

sentences.en: He's probably going to finish up in jail for business fraud.
sentences.cn: 他最后很可能会因为商业诈骗而入狱。

sentences.en: He’s been in jail for three months already.
In the end the "bad guys" are caught and sent to jail.
sentences.cn: 最后，“坏人”都被抓住送进了监狱。

sentences.en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

sentences.en: Martinez was taken off to jail.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯被抓进了大牢。

sentences.en: Mr Garcia said his conscience was clear over the jail incidents.
sentences.cn: 加西亚先生说他对监狱中发生的事件问心无愧。

sentences.en: One prisoner was still holding out on the roof of the jail.
sentences.cn: 一名犯人仍在监狱的房顶上顽抗。

sentences.en: Reports are now coming in of trouble at yet another jail.
sentences.cn: 另一所监狱也发生了骚乱的消息正在不断传来。

sentences.en: Strenuous efforts had been made to improve conditions in the jail.
sentences.cn: 已经做了大量的努力来改善监狱的条件。

sentences.en: Those two should have been thrown in jail.
sentences.cn: 那两个人早就应该抓去坐牢。

sentences.en: Under Greece's stiff anti-drugs laws they could face twenty years in jail.
sentences.cn: 根据希腊严厉的反毒品法律，他们将面临20年监禁。

sentences.en: Watson was jailed for tax evasion.

trans.tran_en: a place where criminals are kept as part of their punishment, or where people who have been charged with a crime are kept before they are judged in a law court
